snippet: The new oath adopted by Girl Guides Australia removes references to God and the queen, and the word "obedience" has been dropped from the Girl Guide Law. Leaders say the new wording is more inclusive, more relevant to an increasingly multicultural...
abstract: The new oath adopted by Girl Guides Australia removes references to God and the queen, and the word "obedience" has been dropped from the Girl Guide Law. Leaders say the new wording is more inclusive, more relevant to an increasingly multicultural Australia. Not everyone, of course, agrees.

headline.main: Girl Guides Change Oath to Delete God and the Queen

keywords.name: persons
keywords.value: Elizabeth II, Queen of Great Britain
